description: Cycling can have many perks like burning a cluster of calories, better stress levels, better joint mobility, and so on. But one of the most disappointing defeats is when you get your gear on and find out that it is raining. Akonza Indoor stationary bike grants you your wish of burning an excessive amount of fat while staying inside your home. It built with rich quality steel and has aluminum alloy paddles, making it sturdy and durable. It also has the ability to scan your heart rate and display it on the LCD display while you paddle sitting on a comfortable leather seat. A home fat-burning equipment that can be adjusted according to your needs and can hold up to 330lbs
